DOC.brief_summary: This study assess effect 26 week once-weekly treatment MK-217A/Alendronate Sodium 70-mg/Vitamin D3 5600 IU Combination Tablet ( Fosamax Plus 70/5600 ) serum level 25-hydroxyvitamin D [ 25 ( OH ) D ] .
DOC.brief_title: Study MK-217A/Alendronate Sodium 70-mg/Vitamin D3 5600 IU Combination Tablet ( MK-0217A-329 )
DOC.criteria: Man age 50 old , woman postmenopausal day sign informed consent menopausal least one year Meets bone mineral density ( BMD ) criterion Agree discontinue osteoporosis drug treatment duration study Any contraindication alendronate vitamin D Not ambulatory Has receive treatment anabolic steroid agent within past 12 month , systemic glucocorticoid , 2 week past 6 month , current use immunosuppressant , fluoride treatment dose great 1 mg/day 2 week within past 3 month , treat parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) 2 week within past 3 month , current use chemotherapy heparin , use growth hormone 2 week within past 6 month , use active hormonal vitamin D analogs past 2 month , current use vitamin A > 10,000 IU daily , current use , lithium , anticonvulsant include barbiturate , hydantoin , carbamazepine , current use calcium supplement amount excess 1500 mg daily , and/or current use Vitamin D supplement History malignancy < 5 year , except adequately treat basal cell squamous cell skin cancer situ cervical cancer One follow concomitant condition : Upper gastrointestinal ( GI ) disorder adequately control ; myocardial infarction , unstable angina , stroke revascularization condition within 3 month ; malabsorption syndrome ; primary secondary hyperparathyroidism adequately treat ; thyroid disease adequately control ; severe renal insufficiency ; uncontrolled genitourinary , cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , endocrine , hematologic , neurological , psychiatric , pulmonary disease ; uncontrolled hypertension ; new onset diabetes ( within 3 month ) , poorly control hyperglycemia , hypoglycemia cause ; evidence metabolic bone disease osteoporosis ; abnormal index calcium metabolism ; and/or active renal stone disease User illicit recreational drug recent history ( within last year ) drug alcohol abuse dependence Heavy consumer alcohol alcohol containing product .
